bridge-type.label: EMBY Server
bridge-type.description: This is the Bridge to an instance of an EMBY server you want to connect to.

parameter.name: api
parameter.label: API Key
parameter.description: This is the API key generated from EMBY used for Authorization.

parameter.name: bufferSize
parameter.label: Web Socket Buffer Size
parameter.description: Here you can define a custom size for the websocket buffer size. Default is 10,0000

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: ipAddress
parameter.description: This is the ip address of the EMBY Server.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: This is the port of the EMBY server.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Parameter
parameter.description: This is the refresh interval in milliseconds that will be sent to the websocket. Default is 10,000

parameter.name: discovery
parameter.label: Discovery
parameter.description: If set to false the controller will not add new things from devices to the inbox.

thing-type.label: EMBY Binding Device
thing-type.description: This is a player device which connects to an EMBY server to play files that you want to montior.

parameter.name: deviceID
parameter.label: DeviceID
parameter.description: This is the deviceId you want to connect to to monitor.

channel-type.label: Send Play
channel-type.description: String to send a comma-delimited list of item id's that will be played by the client. The string should be in JSON format with all desired parameters from the EMBY API. https://github.com/MediaBrowser/Emby/wiki/Remote-control

channel-type.label: Control
channel-type.description: Control the Emby Player, e.g. start/stop/next/previous/ffward/rewind

channel-type.label: Stop
channel-type.description: Stops the player. ON if the player is stopped.

channel-type.label: Current Time
channel-type.description: Current time of currently playing media

channel-type.label: Media Type
channel-type.description: Media type of the current file

channel-type.label: General Command With Arguments
channel-type.description: Send a general command that accepts arguments. The argument should be sent as a string in json format. For example, SetVolume - {Volume:50}

channel-type.label: image url
channel-type.description: The url of the playing media

parameter.name: imageurl_maxHeight
parameter.label: Image Max Height
parameter.description: The maximum height of the image that will be retrieved.

parameter.name: imageurl_maxWidth
parameter.label: Image Max Width
parameter.description: The maximum width of the image that will be retrieved.
